html: In the past 120 years, average human lifespan in the US has nearly doubled. Not so for pets, which means we experience double the pet tragedies. C'mon, science, give us 30-year dogs & cats! (Not every tweet needs to diss our a-hole President.)
text:
In the past 120 years, average human lifespan in the US has nearly doubled. Not so for pets, which means we experience double the pet tragedies. C'mon, science, give us 30-year dogs & cats!
(Not every tweet needs to diss our a-hole President.)

html: Dumb little conjecture on flight to Albuquerque There's a finite number (maybe even zero) of 3 consecutive odd integers, with two integer powers surrounding a prime.

Dumb little conjecture on flight to Albuquerque
There's a finite number (maybe even zero) of 3 consecutive odd integers, with two integer powers surrounding a prime.
